image.alt: Mohamed ZAALI - Data Science and AI Engineering Student

header.title: About Me
header.subtitle: A Data Science and AI engineering student at ENSAM Rabat, Morocco

content.paragraph: I'm one of those people who believe data has stories to tell. My first love is diving into numbers to find meaning, build models that predict the future, and understand the "why." But what good is a story if it's not well told? That's where my passion for Full Stack Development comes in. I absolutely love turning complex insights into beautiful, intuitive, and useful applications that people can actually use. To me, coding is a creative outlet: it's about building bridges between the pure logic of AI and the human experience.

curiosity.title: Always Curious
curiosity.detail_content: Driven by curiosity to understand how things work and discover new technologies in AI and development.

collaboration.title: Great Collaboration
collaboration.detail_content: The best projects come from great collaboration, different perspectives, and shared knowledge.

coffee.title: Good Coffee
coffee.detail_content: Good coffee is the catalyst for creative thinking and those breakthrough moments that make all the difference.

cta.title: Let's Connect
cta.content: Ready to build something amazing together?

current.field: Digital Engineering in Data Science, AI & Digital Health

prep.title: Preparatory Classes
prep.description: Focused on advanced mathematics and physics in a rigorous two-year program.

ccna.title: CCNA: Introduction to Networks
ccna.description: Cisco networking fundamentals and practical network configuration
ccna.skill1: Configuring switches, routers, and network devices for end-to-end connectivity
ccna.skill2: Creating IPv4/IPv6 addressing schemes and network troubleshooting
ccna.skill3: Understanding OSI model, Ethernet protocols, and network security best practices

datacamp1.title: Introduction to Data
datacamp1.description: Gateway to understanding data fundamentals and decision-making
datacamp1.skill1: Data Basics: Types, structures, and importance in decision-making processes
datacamp1.skill2: Data Wisdom: DIKW framework and real-world data-driven decision examples
datacamp1.skill3: Data Ethics: Privacy, data lifecycle, and handling common data mistakes

datacamp2.title: Data Structures and Algorithms in Python
datacamp2.description: Comprehensive understanding of computer science fundamentals
datacamp2.skill1: Data Structures: Linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, and Big O notation
datacamp2.skill2: Search Algorithms: Linear search, binary search, DFS, BFS, and binary search trees
datacamp2.skill3: Sorting Algorithms: Bubble sort, selection sort, merge sort, and quicksort implementation

albarid.project: Design and development of a platform for analyzing POS, SoftPOS, and e-commerce transactions.
albarid.achievement1: Built a secure REST API (Spring Boot, JWT) enabling fast access to aggregated transaction data.
albarid.achievement2: Designed and delivered an interactive dashboard (Angular, ngx-charts) for transaction visualization and exploration.
albarid.achievement3: Created the software architecture in UML to ensure system maintainability and scalability.

ministry.company: Ministry of Youth, Culture and Communication
ministry.project: Development of a predictive analytics system for cultural heritage preservation.
ministry.achievement1: Developed a predictive model (Random Forest, 92% accuracy) to forecast cultural heritage degradation.
ministry.achievement2: Integrated the model into a web application (Flask) to support experts in decision-making.
ministry.achievement3: Deployed the solution on an Ubuntu server (Gunicorn, Nginx), ensuring availability and performance.
